Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Washington & Central, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Washington then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Washington & Laramie, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Washington & Laramie, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Clinton due to Bridge Lift. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Clinton due to Bridge Lift. Crews working to restore service

Green and Pink Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

 

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

 

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
